Name: Mysterious Blocks 2
About the game: Mysterious Blocks 2 is the second part of an exciting puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels. You are waiting for a new meeting with a mysterious stranger who again needs your help, destroy block by block to advance further. It is up to you to decide whether you will be able to go this way. Features of the game: - Many levels - Convenient management - Physics
Meta Title: Mysterious Blocks 2: Jun 17, 2021, Enoops and Full Overview
